languages.text: {n}Полумеханическое создание приветствует вас, распахнув широкие крылья и подняв обе головы. Орел взирает на вас, готовый выполнить любой приказ.{/n}
{n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Полумеханическое создание приветствует вас, распахнув широкие крылья и подняв обе головы. Орел взирает на вас, готовый выполнить любой приказ.{/n}

{n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}

languages.text: {n}半分機械化された生物は、翼を大きく広げ、二つの頭を持ち上げてあなたに挨拶した。イーグルは鋭い警戒心をもってあなたを見据え、どんな命令にも即座に応じる構えを見せている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}半分機械化された生物は、翼を大きく広げ、二つの頭を持ち上げてあなたに挨拶した。イーグルは鋭い警戒心をもってあなたを見据え、どんな命令にも即座に応じる構えを見せている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die halb-mechanische Kreatur begrüßt dich, indem sie die Flügel ausbreitet und beide Köpfe anhebt. Der Adler betrachtet dich aufmerksam, bereit, jeden Befehl auszuführen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die halb-mechanische Kreatur begrüßt dich, indem sie die Flügel ausbreitet und beide Köpfe anhebt. Der Adler betrachtet dich aufmerksam, bereit, jeden Befehl auszuführen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature mi-animale, mi-mécanique vous salue en étendant ses ailes et en relevant ses deux têtes. L'aigle vous observe de son regard perçant, prêt à obéir au moindre de vos ordres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature mi-animale, mi-mécanique vous salue en étendant ses ailes et en relevant ses deux têtes. L'aigle vous observe de son regard perçant, prêt à obéir au moindre de vos ordres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La criatura medio mecánica te saluda extendiendo sus alas cuan anchas son y levantando ambas cabezas. El águila te observa con detenimiento, dispuesta a cumplir tus órdenes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura medio mecánica te saluda extendiendo sus alas cuan anchas son y levantando ambas cabezas. El águila te observa con detenimiento, dispuesta a cumplir tus órdenes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只一半肉体、一半机械的猎鹰张开了翅膀，抬起两个头，迎接你的到来。它警觉地看着你，随时准备执行你下达的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The half-mechanical creature greets you by spreading its wings wide and raising both of its heads. The eagle regards you with alertness, ready to carry out any order.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只一半肉体、一半机械的猎鹰张开了翅膀，抬起两个头，迎接你的到来。它警觉地看着你，随时准备执行你下达的命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yarı mekanik yaratık, kanatlarını gerip başının üstüne kaldırarak seni selamlıyor. Kartal, her türlü emrine amade olduğunu sana bildiriyor.{/n}
